name: HellTender
description:
NOTE: THE HIGH SCORE UPLOADS AREN'T WORKING RIGHT NOW - SORRY ABOUT THAT!

You've been sent down to Hell for eternal damnation - who knows what sins you've committed - and your punishment is a low-paying job as a barista! Unfortunately for you, Hell is full of restless souls, and they all want coffee. And they won't stop coming for it.

Your job is simple - make sure that the drinks are the right temperature, by watering them down just enough, and you might live to make another drink. Don't, though, and you might find yourself in a much worse situation...

FEATURING:
  • Over 9 unique drinks to make
  • Endless content
  • Realistic working conditions for a demonic worker
  • A global scoreboard - compare your scores with your friends!
  • Tons of fun

As a side note,  it was very fun making this game - and I'm happy with how it turned out! I'm really please with the graphics especially, and it's probably one of my better looking games. There were some difficulties, and I never did get that damned scoreboard working, but I've come out of it at the other end with a finished game - and that's always a great thing to achieve! Can't wait to see what everyone else has made!
